EmailTemplate.name: VMworld VIP Cocktail Party.Maybe responses
EmailTemplate.subject: We Hope to See You at the VMTurbo VIP Cocktail Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We do hope to see you at the reception on Monday, August 25.
When your schedule becomes established, feel free to revisit <http://bit.ly/1aYROIo> this invitation and click “yes” to register.. We’ll send you a quick reminder in a few days.
Meanwhile, download your free ParadisePack <http://bit.ly/13GZHZ9>, where you’ll learn more about how VMTurbo helps you gain control of your virtual datacenter so that you can relax and focus on other important aspects of your job.
Sincerely,
The VMTurbo Team
